definitions.definition: A handgun with a revolving chamber enabling several shots to be fired without reloading.
Any (personal) firearm with such a mechanism.
Synonym of revolving line of credit , a form of credit permitting the holder to repeatedly borrow money.
Agent noun of revolve ; something that revolves.

main_definition: ( firearms ) A handgun with a revolving chamber enabling several shots to be fired without reloading.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any (personal) firearm with such a mechanism.
( finance ) Synonym of revolving line of credit , a form of credit permitting the holder to repeatedly borrow money.
Agent noun of revolve ; something that revolves.
